com.uk.aisl.guidewire.shredder.database

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uk.aisl.guidewire.shredder.database.ConnectionManager

  • public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Connection Manager wrapping class that uses singleton connections to obtain a single connection to either the source (the database for the pay load XML); the error (the database for the error logging) or the target (the database the pay load will be written into) databases.
    Author:
    Gareth Edwards, Karl Parry
